item.title: Lower FIT Threshold to Boost Bowel Cancer Detection
item.description: From February, the NHS will cut the FIT blood threshold, triggering more colonoscopies and earlier detection of hundreds of more bowel cancer cases. M...

item.title: Participants Praise Palliative Care Program for the Homeless
item.description: Patients experiencing homelessness emphasized the compassionate, holistic approach that the program took to providing care. Medscape News Canada

item.title: Upfront Radiation Boosts ICI Response in Breast Cancer
item.description: For women with higher-risk breast cancer, 3 days of radiotherapy might enhance the immune response to checkpoint inhibitors. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Shortage of Neurology Staff Threatens Patient Care
